title: Beautiful 4 bed 3 bath remodel in Park hill!!! 3085 Fairfax St.
posting_body: ['Address: 3085 Fairfax St. , Denver, CO 80207', 'Rent: $3000', 'Bedrooms: 4', 'Bathrooms: 3', 'Available: MOVE IN READY!!!', 'Type: Single family', 'Beautiful 4 bed 3 bath remodel in Park hill!!!', 'This beautifully updated 4 bed 3 bath oversized Ranch house in prestigious Park Hill has newly-finished original hardwood floors, new carpet, and fresh two-tone paint throughout.', "It's a perfect family home with nearly 2,500 square feet of living space and excellent school options: located in the Park Hill Elementary school zone (a 9/10 rating from <URL>), close to McAuliffe International School (an International Baccalaureate [IB] middle school), and East High School (a 96% graduation rate and far above the state average in key measures of college and career readiness).", 'Updated kitchen with large pantry, plenty of storage, and brand-new stainless-steel appliances â€“ refrigerator, range/oven, microwave, and dishwasher.', 'Large master suite features walk-in closet and updated bathroom with separate tub and shower.', 'Huge basement offers additional living and sleeping space, with new egress window for safety and an updated 3/4 bathroom.', 'New sod and decorative rock landscaping in front.', 'Fully fenced backyard with freshly laid sod leading to a garage with attached carport.', 'This home is central to everything â€“ minutes away from I-70 and downtown, only blocks away from Fairfax Park, and close to the new restaurant/retail development.', 'Apply today!', 'Leasing', 'show contact info', '.', 'We are looking for a tenant with previous rental history and verifiable income at 2.5xs the monthly rent.', 'We also check credit and criminal and history.', 'If there is an issue anywhere on the application you may be required to pay a larger deposit.', 'Application fee is $40 per adult.', 'INCO Property Management & Sales', 'Leasing Department', '6640 S Broadway Suite A', 'Centennial, CO 80121', 'show contact info']
